templateName.title:
TemplateName name of template to use in AnalysisRun
+optional

clusterScope.title:
Whether to look for the templateName at cluster scope or namespace scope
+optional

templates.title:
Templates reference to a list of analysis templates to combine for an AnalysisRun
+patchMergeKey=templateName
+patchStrategy=merge

value.title: Value a hardcoded value for the argument. This field is a one of field with valueFrom

podTemplateHashValue.title: PodTemplateHashValue gets the value from one of the children ReplicaSet's Pod Template Hash

fieldPath.title: Required: Path of the field to select in the specified API version

valueFrom.title: ArgumentValueFrom defines references to fields within resources to grab for the value (i.e. Pod Template Hash)

items.title: AnalysisRunArgument argument to add to analysisRun

args.title:
Args the arguments that will be added to the AnalysisRuns
+patchMergeKey=name
+patchStrategy=merge

metricName.description:
Name of the metric which needs to be evaluated in the Dry-Run mode. Wildcard '*' is supported and denotes all
the available metrics.

items.description: DryRun defines the settings for running the analysis in Dry-Run mode.

dryRun.title:
DryRun object contains the settings for running the analysis in Dry-Run mode
+patchMergeKey=metricName
+patchStrategy=merge
+optional

metricName.description: MetricName is the name of the metric on which this retention policy should be applied.

limit.description: Limit is the maximum number of measurements to be retained for this given metric.

items.description: MeasurementRetention defines the settings for retaining the number of measurements during the analysis.

measurementRetention.title:
MeasurementRetention object contains the settings for retaining the number of measurements during the analysis
+patchMergeKey=metricName
+patchStrategy=merge
+optional

labels.title:
Labels Additional labels to add to the AnalysisRun
+optional

annotations.title:
Annotations additional annotations to add to the AnalysisRun
+optional

analysisRunMetadata.title: AnalysisRunMetadata extra labels to add to the AnalysisRun

title: RolloutAnalysis defines a template that is used to create a analysisRun
